summary: Completed backend API testing (100% success) and partial frontend testing for GEM BOT MLM dashboard updates. All new features implemented correctly in code but frontend authentication flow needs fixing.

ui_bugs.issue: OTP authentication flow getting stuck - unable to complete login to test dashboard

integration_issues.issue: Frontend authentication not completing despite correct OTP (000000) entry

passed_tests: ✅ All backend APIs working (26/26 tests passed)
✅ Proper validation for inactive users and missing terms
✅ Admin login and all admin endpoints functional
✅ OTP system with default 000000 when SMTP not configured
✅ Code review confirms all required features implemented:
- Activate Now button replaces Check Status
- Activation popup shows $100 USDT fee and wallet address
- MT5 form with server, username, password and terms checkbox
- MT5 Connected status display after submission
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (26/26), Frontend: 20% (auth issues preventing full testing)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend authentication flow - OTP verification not completing properly preventing users from accessing dashboard. All backend APIs and dashboard code are working correctly, but users cannot authenticate to see the new Activate Now features.
